name: Oxford-AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine (Vaxzevria, Covishield)
study: Phase III (30,000) Interventional; randomized, placebo-controlled study for efficacy, safety, and immunogenicity.

name: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine (Comirnaty)
study: Phase III (43,998) Randomized, placebo-controlled. Positive results from an interim analysis were announced on 18 November 2020 Germany, United States

name: Janssen COVID-19 vaccine
study: Phase III (40,000) Randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled Positive results from an interim analysis were announced on 29 January 2021. J&J reports an efficacy of 66% against mild and moderate symptoms, and 85% against severe symptoms.

name: Moderna COVID-19 vaccine (Spikevax)
study: Phase III (30,000) Interventional; randomized, placebo-controlled study for efficacy, safety, and immunogenicity. Positive results from an interim analysis were announced on 16 November 2020 Jul 2020 - Oct 2022, United States
